text: Big Shark is an upcoming horror drama film directed and produced by Tommy Wiseau. It was written by and stars Greg Sestero, Isaiah LaBorde and Tommy Wiseau. The film was scheduled to have its world premiere at the Prince Charles Cinema in September 2019, but was delayed. == Premise == == Cast == * Greg Sestero as Georgie * Isaiah LaBorde as Tim * Tommy Wiseau as Patrick * Hannah Mouton == Production == On February 7, 2019, filming began in Lafayette, Louisiana for two weeks. In the same month, the first teaser trailer was released. == Release == Big Shark was scheduled to have its world premiere at the Prince Charles Cinema in September 2019, but was delayed. On July 21, 2020, Wiseau revealed that the film will be released soon. == References == == External links == * Category:2020s horror thriller films Category:American drama films Category:American films Category:American independent films Category:American natural horror films Category:English- language films Category:Films about shark attacks Category:Films set in New Orleans Category:Films shot in Louisiana Category:Upcoming films
title: Big Shark
